trans-unit.source: Represents a column of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewComboBoxColumn class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewComboBoxColumn 类是特殊的类型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>用于逻辑主机使用户能够从选项列表中选择值的单元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewComboBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewComboBoxColumn 具有的关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>中每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>相交它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the cells manually by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置手动填充单元格其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以将列绑定到数据源由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a database table, set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of a column in the table.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是绑定到数据库表，请将此列设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>为表中的列的名称的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a collection of objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是绑定到的对象的集合，请将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>对象属性的名称的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将值添加到手动填充列的下拉列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，通过设置列，其自己的数据源绑定下拉列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值是集合中的对象或数据库表中的记录，还必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>属性指示哪个对象属性或数据库列提供下拉列表中显示的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>属性指示哪个对象属性或数据库列用于设置单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: One typical scenario is to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 一个典型方案是将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>到父数据库表控件以及如何绑定到相关的子表的下拉列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制转移到`Orders`包含表`ProductID`列和列组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>属性`Products`包含表`ProductID`和`ProductName`列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you would set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，会将列设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>属性设置为"ProductID"来填充它单元格的值从`Orders.ProductID`列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property to "ProductID" and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property to "ProductName".
trans-unit.target: 但是，若要在单元格和下拉列表中显示实际的产品名称，将映射到这些值`Products`通过设置表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>"ProductID"的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>为"产品名称"的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property) must include the actual cell values or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 下拉列表值 (或值由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>属性) 必须包含实际的单元值或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将列设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>，并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>将自动设置属性包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>列中的所有单元格的相应属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆盖特定单元格这些属性值，首先，设置的列属性，然后设置的单元属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> does not have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反，从下拉列表中选择一个值设置的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此列类型的默认排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref>类为默认状态。

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>实例，此构造函数设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>到新的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>实例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列中的单元格是否将匹配的单元格中具有一个从可能的选项输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>的列中每个单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto completion is activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自动完成已激活;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建单元格的模板。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>类初始化到新创建的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>此属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>的构造函数

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响的列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>列中的所有其他单元格建模之后。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一种新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当将此属性设置为值的类型不是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 创建此列的一个精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可以复制的单元格一列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，表示克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置填充组合框的选项的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 数据源或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>属性指定要从中检索组合框下拉列表中显示的选择数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the DataSource property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column.
trans-unit.target: 当使用数据源属性中，如果必须从非默认属性或列中，绘制数据则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>属性必须设置为非默认属性或列的名称。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource property is set to a string array, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源属性设置为一个字符串数组，然后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>不需要设置，因为数组中的每个字符串将用于值和显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示数据源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定的属性或要从中检索在组合框中显示的字符串的列。

trans-unit.source: The data for the values stored in a column of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> objects is obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>获取对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>的列中存储的值的数据

trans-unit.source: If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the DisplayMember property must be set to the necessary property name or column name.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数据来自于非默认属性或列，则 DisplayMember 属性必须设置为必需属性名称或列名称。

trans-unit.source: If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use DisplayMember and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values.
trans-unit.target: 如果单元格的值对用户不可见的内部值，然后使用 DisplayMember 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>将内部单元格值映射到用户可以查看的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the DisplayMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>属性设置为字符串数组，DisplayMember 属性不需要设置，因为将使用每个字符串数组中的，为有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它指定属性或列的名称中指定的数据源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定没有编辑时组合框的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayStyle property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: DisplayStyle 属性会影响列中的单元格的外观，当它们处于未处于编辑模式，并且无论是只读的。

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格处于编辑模式时，它始终如下所示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property value is `false`, the DisplayStyle property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the DisplayStyle property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>属性值是`false`，DisplayStyle 属性会影响列中的所有单元格; 否则，DisplayStyle 属性影响仅对当前单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 行为和外观的单元格中的下拉箭头将由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the DisplayStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用单元格突出显示当鼠标指针在单元格时，你必须将 DisplayStyle 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref> value indicating the combo box appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>值，该值指示组合框外观。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*> property value applies only to the current cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control when the current cell is in this column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>属性值仅适用于在当前单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制对当前单元格时此列中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>

trans-unit.source: If the DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly property value is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly 属性值是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>属性会影响所有列单元格中; 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>属性会都影响仅对当前单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>属性会影响列中的单元格的外观，当它们处于未处于编辑模式，并且无论是只读的。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格处于编辑模式时，它始终如下所示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果显示样式仅适用于当前单元格;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the drop-down lists of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置框组合的下拉列表的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>成员。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>的列中每个单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，下拉列表的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列的单元格的平面样式外观。

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: FlatStyle 属性会影响的行为和外观此列中的单元格的下拉箭头。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], when the FlatStyle property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the FlatStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)]，当 FlatStyle 属性设置为`Flat`或`Popup`下拉箭头调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```若要启用单元格突出显示当鼠标指针在单元格时，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>，到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> FlatStyle 属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the cell appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>值，该值指示单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 获取用作组合框中选项的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Items or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 项或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性用于填充组合框的选择。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If strings are added to Items, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串添加到项，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>属性不需要由于添加每个字符串将用于值和显示设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>不支持的多个具有相同的显示值项使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set, then Items cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>设置属性，则不能使用项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection> that represents the selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>表示组合框中的选择。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列单元格中下拉列表中的项的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>的列中每个单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
trans-unit.target: 最大项数下拉列表，从 1 到 100。

trans-unit.source: The default is 8.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 8。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否进行了排序组合框中的项。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>的列中每个单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果组合框进行了排序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个描述该列的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>用于描述列。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定的属性或从其获取对应于下拉列表中选择的值的列。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> for more information about its relationship with ValueMember.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>有关的 ValueMember 其关系的详细信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the ValueMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>属性设置为字符串数组、 不需要设置，因为将使用每个字符串数组中的，为有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值的 ValueMember 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定属性的名称值或列中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
